about_the_game:
Horror made anew

Don't Remember aims to rethink how both players and developers approach horror games, and bring a new and fresh experience to the table. Immerse yourself in this dark and atmospheric environment with dynamic audio which adapts to the way you play and makes each playthrough slightly unique. Uncover the story of William, a once renowned alchemist, now lost to his own schizophrenic mind. Dig up the remnants of Williams forgotten past and the reason for his amnesia through the power of colors, which allow you to solve many puzzles scattered throughout this inconspicuously twisted mansion.

Features:

  • Power of colors: A lightsource has been a staple in nearly all horror games, use it to your advantage! Find and unlock new colors to your lantern which allow you to explore the mansion further and progress the story in this semi-open, metroidvania-style mansion.
  • Procedural experience: Experience procedurally generated events and scares in the game, making each gameplay feel just a little different.
  • Tense narrative: Experience a thrilling story told through professional voice actors and award-winning writers

content_descriptors.notes: Implied violence. Implied use of alcohol and drugs. Implied domestic abuse through audio and voice acting

name: Don't Remember

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 5500
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended: SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Don’t Remember, some things are better left forgotten. Fight your amnesia in this atmospheric, first person psychological horror game. Solve the mystery of the old mansion in 1900’s England through the use of your lantern’s various colors and face its hidden grotesque visage.
